instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3662 no chime no video
threads.message: Board is working. Hold a flashlight to the Apple logo and check if there is a picture.

threads.title: 820-3662 no chime no video

I check now but no picture 
and reset pram make

no chime no picture no video no external video

threads.title: 820-3662 no chime no video
threads.message: Did you try a PRAM reset with external keyboard? Internal one may not work. Chime should be present after PRAM

threads.title: 820-3662 no chime no video
threads.message: You say CPU Vcore is 1.68V, it should get warm a little.

threads.title: 820-3662 no chime no video
threads.message:
Then the mouse doesn't light too...
Check ALL_SYS_PWRGD signal.

threads.title: 820-3662 no chime no video
threads.message: No way a USB mouse will light up when there is no CPU Vcore. You said PPVCC_S0_CPU 1.68V?
